product.name: Heavy Duty Curtain Rods for Windows 72 to 144 Inches, 1 Inch Silver Adjustable Curtain Rods with Diamond Finials (Silver,72-144)
product.description:
Size for 16"-30" has 1 telescopic rod(7/8" diameter)and 1 fixed rod(1" diameter)expand and reduce the size by increasing or decreasing the fixed rod of 1" diameter.Also the 7/8" telescoping rods at end are easy to adjust in length to fit your window size.
Size for 28"-48" has 1 telescopic rod(7/8" diameter)and 3 fixed rod(1" diameter)expand and reduce the size by increasing or decreasing the fixed rod of 1" diameter.Also the 7/8" telescoping rods at end are easy to adjust in length to fit your window size.
Size for 48"-84" has 1 telescopic rod(7/8" diameter)and 5 fixed rod(1" diameter)expand and reduce the size by increasing or decreasing the fixed rod of 1" diameter.Also the 7/8" telescoping rods at end are easy to adjust in length to fit your window size.
Size for 66"-120" has 1 telescopic rod(7/8" diameter)and 7 fixed rod(1" diameter)expand and reduce the size by increasing or decreasing the fixed rod of 1" diameter.Also the 7/8" telescoping rods at end are easy to adjust in length to fit your window size.
Size for 72"-144" has 1 telescopic rod(7/8" diameter)and 9 fixed rod(1" diameter)expand and reduce the size by increasing or decreasing the fixed rod of 1" diameter.Also the 7/8" telescoping rods at end are easy to adjust in length to fit your window size.
product.bullet_points:
• 【Curtain Rods for Windows 72 to 144 inch(6-12ft)】Package include 9 x 16" x 1" fixed rods,1 x 16" x 7/8" adjustable rods,2 x finial,3 x bracket,6 x anchor,6 x screw.Silver curtain rods for windows can extend from 72 to 144 inches, choose the right size curtain rods according to the length of your window.
• 【Heavy Duty Curtain Rods】SIMEWIN curtain rods is 1 inch diameter, 0.8mm thickness,surface treated with high temperature color-fixing process, no fading, delicate texture, wear-resisting.Curtain rod tube thickness is 30% more than others,max load 30Lbs. Sturdy and durable.
• 【Modern Diamond Design Finials】No complex design, we choose the most simple rounded finials for your home,it’s more like a Diamond, fits for any type of draperies and all scenarios.Matching a variety of house styles and window treatments, including bedrooms, living rooms, dining rooms, kitchens and outdoor curtain rods for patio.It not only provides visual balance, but also adds a classic touch to your home décor.
• 【Adjustable Curtain Rods】There are few 16" fixed rods and 1 adjustable 16" telescoping drapery rods inside. You can adjust the rod size according to the length of the window. Please select the rod size you need according to the size chart, it can be expanded to fit a particular window size.【Easy Mounting】With inside mounting hardware and installation instruction you can mount these curtain rods easily.
• 【The Best Guarantee】With our high quality control, you will never have to worry about your curtain rods. Save your walls and furnishings from the wear and tear of curtains with this sturdy and stylish curtain rods. Also, SIMEWIN offers strong after-sales service for the curtain rods we sell,If you have any questions, please be the first to tell us, we will be happy to provide you with help and solutions.
